name: Aurora DarkLight
description:
Story You play Aurora, a being born of the power of the queen of angels and the queen of demons.
Your goal is to defeat Sylas, known as the Painter. He's plunged the world into unspeakable chaos with his army of ink creatures. Gameplay Switch between Angelic and Demonic forms to defeat your opponents. Each form offers a different gameplay and therefore access to specific abilities.

For the Weekly Gam Jam 140 : ShapeShift
Made By Nogam.
